Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Roles describe what an OpenCms user should do. A role control the permissions of users wrt. to system specific functions. Here, you can get an overview on the available roles.

What you will not find here, but elsewhere is:

  • General information on permissions in OpenCms
  • Information on groups, users, and OUs
  • Concrete information on how roles are assigned to users

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Each OpenCms user acts in a special role - reaching from root administrators to element authors. Learn about the available roles and the permissions implied by a role.
